Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
Lebowski.ISynchronizationSessionDescribes the part of the state of a synchronization session that is relevant for a synchronization algorithm to perform its task
Lebowski.Net.AbstractConnectionProvides functionality that classes implementing IConnection usually share
Lebowski.Net.ConnectionFailedExceptionThe exception that is thrown when a connection attempt by an IConnection has failed
Lebowski.Net.HostSessionEventArgsProvides data for the HostSession event
Lebowski.Net.ICommunicationProtocolProvides functionality to share a session or participate in an existing session and describes the exact capabilities that the protocol supports
Lebowski.Net.IConnectionProvides functionality for bi-directional communication with another host. Outgoing communication is performed with Send, whereas to react to incoming messages, the client has to subscribe to the Received event
Lebowski.Net.JoinSessionEventArgsProvides data for the JoinSession event
Lebowski.Net.Local.LocalConnectionProvides functionality to allow local connecctions (i.e. within the application), mainly for testing scenarios
Lebowski.Net.Multichannel.MultichannelConnectionAllows multiple separate connection to be tunneled through the same `IConnection`, by creating multiple channels. This is useful when you want to use the same connection for the synchroniation strategy, chat, execution result sharing, etc
Lebowski.Net.Multichannel.MultichannelMessageSent when a message is tunneled through a MultichannelConnection
Lebowski.Net.Multichannel.TunneledConnection
Lebowski.Net.ReceivedEventArgsProvides data for the Received event
Lebowski.Net.Skype.AcceptSharingInvitationMessageSent when a client accepts a SharingInvitationMessage using the SkypeProtocol
Lebowski.Net.Skype.DeclineSharingInvitationMessageSent when a client rejects a SharingInvitationMessage using the SkypeProtocol
Lebowski.Net.Skype.SharingInvitationMessageSent when a client wants to share a session using the SkypeProtocol
Lebowski.Net.Skype.SkypeConnectionRepresents a connection that uses the Skype AP2AP API
Lebowski.Net.Skype.SkypeProtocolThis provides a wrapper around the AP2AP Skype4COM API that allows us to send arbitrary objects to other skype users, even when behind a firewall. There currently are a few shortcomings:

  • no proper handling of case when a user is logged into Skype multiple times
  • Objects are being serialized and then encoded to base64, as skype does not allow '' in the data stream. This could be addressed by using a more efficient encoding. Also, it might be worth to look into ProtocolBuffers instead of using serialization.
  • Skype does seem to produce weird call stacks, as calling a skype API method can trigger a Skype event being triggered before that original call returns. We addressed this by introducing a separate dispatch thread
Lebowski.Net.Skype.SkypeShareFormThe form that is displayed to the user when he would like to share a skype session, providing the user with choice about the exact session parameters
Lebowski.Net.Tcp.TcpClientConnectionA connection with a TCP server as the endpoint
Lebowski.Net.Tcp.TcpConnectionA connection using TCP with a fixed endpoint
Lebowski.Net.Tcp.TcpParticipateFormThe form that is displayed to the user when he would like to participate in a session using TCP. It provides the user with choice about the exact connection settings
Lebowski.Net.Tcp.TcpProtocolProvides functionality to establish TCP connections between two sites
Lebowski.Net.Tcp.TcpServerConnectionA TCP server that listens to incoming connections and accepts the first one, then providing methods to communicate with it
Lebowski.Net.Tcp.TcpShareFormThe form that is displayed when the user would like to share a session using TCP. It provides the user with choice about the exact connection settings
Lebowski.Program
Lebowski.Synchronization.DifferentialSynchronization.DifferentialSynchronizationStrategyThis class provides an implementation of the Differential Synchronization synchronization algorithm by Neil Fraser. It is based around sending patches of local changes to other sites and is described in detail in [1]
Lebowski.Synchronization.DifferentialSynchronization.DiffMessageA message that is transmitted to get two ITextContext into the same state
Lebowski.Synchronization.DifferentialSynchronization.TokenRequestMessageThis message is sent when a client has to propagate local changes, but does not currently hold the token
Lebowski.Synchronization.dOPT.DeleteOperationTransformerTransforms a DeleteOperation relative to another TextOperation, as required in the dOPT algorithm
Lebowski.Synchronization.dOPT.InsertOperationTransformerTransforms an InsertOperation relative to another TextOperation, as required in the dOPT algorithm
Lebowski.Synchronization.dOPT.Model< OperationType, ContextType >Represents the dOPT synchronization model
Lebowski.Synchronization.dOPT.Request< OperationType >A Request for an operation that should be performed at remote dOPT sites
Lebowski.Synchronization.ISynchronizationStrategyProvides functionality to keep to StringTextContexts in a consistent states. It has access to a IConnection to transmit messages between the two
Lebowski.Synchronization.StateVectorA state vector, as used in the dOPT algorithm
Lebowski.TextModel.AbstractTextContextProvides functionality that most implementing classes of ITextContext share
Lebowski.TextModel.ChangeEventArgsProvides data for the Change event
Lebowski.TextModel.DeleteEventArgsProvides data for the Delete event. This is used for algorithms that are based on atomic operations (e.g. operational transformations)
Lebowski.TextModel.InsertEventArgsProvides data for the Insert event. This is used for algorithms that are based on atomic operations (e.g. operational transformations)
Lebowski.TextModel.ITextContextA text context, that contains the state of a collaboratively shared document
Lebowski.TextModel.Operations.DeleteOperation
Lebowski.TextModel.Operations.InsertOperation
Lebowski.TextModel.Operations.ITextOperationVisitor< ReturnType >A visitor on TextOperation objects
Lebowski.TextModel.Operations.TextOperationA text operation, altering a TextContext in some way
Lebowski.TextModel.StringTextContextA text context that does not have any GUI representation, but just applies operations to a string instead. This is useful for performing text operations on a shared context
Lebowski.TextModel.TextBoxTextContextTextBoxTextContext is a text context that is linked with a standard WinForms TextBox. It does not currently support display of remote selections
Lebowski.TextModel.TextEditorTextContextTextBoxTextContext is a text context that is linked with a standard ICSharpCode.TextEditor that supports syntax hightlighting, display of remote selections currently support display of remote selections
TwinEditor.ApplicationContextContains behavior of the application. It is used with a IApplicationView that subscribes to its events and displays data to the user
TwinEditor.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsProvides per-user and per-application settings associated with this application
TwinEditor.Execution.ExecutionChangedEventArgsProvides data for the ExecutionResult.ExecutionChanged event
TwinEditor.Execution.ExecutionResultA helper class that can be passed around and does nothing but fire events that it receives from the origin of the execution
TwinEditor.Execution.FinishedExecutionEventArgsProvides data for the ExecutionResult.FinishedExecution event
TwinEditor.Execution.PythonInterpreterAn IronPython Interpreter that sets up a python engine and allows execution of python scripts.
TwinEditor.Execution.PythonStdoutWriterA PythonWriterthat writes to System.Console and fires a Write event upon every write
TwinEditor.Execution.PythonStringWriterA PythonWriterthat captures writes and allows access to all written data
TwinEditor.Execution.PythonWriterA writer that can be passed into an IronPython execution to capture data written to a stream
TwinEditor.Execution.WriteEventArgsProvides data for the PythonWriter.Write event
TwinEditor.FileTypes.IFileTypeProvides the behavior and properties of a file type supported by the editor
TwinEditor.FileTypes.PythonFileTypeThe IFileType implementation of a Python File
TwinEditor.FileTypes.TextFileTypeProvides support for a plain text file
TwinEditor.Messaging.ChatMessageSent when the a chat message is broadcast to other sites
TwinEditor.Messaging.CloseSessionMessageSent when a SessionContext is closed or the session is closed for any other reason
TwinEditor.Messaging.ExecutionResultMessageSent when a shared program's execution finishes
TwinEditor.Messaging.InitialContextMessageSent to initially synchronize the client's context with the server's
TwinEditor.Program
TwinEditor.Sharing.BootstrappingStateWill bootstrap a session. This currently does not do much besides screaming "HI" at each other, but it might be used in the future to:

  • Make sure application versions are compatible
  • Agree on a synchronization strategy
  • Check password information
TwinEditor.Sharing.InitializationStateThe InitializationState makes sure that the client receives the initial context present on the server, so they are initially synchronized
TwinEditor.Sharing.ISessionViewA view that displays the data of a session
TwinEditor.Sharing.ReceiveChatMessageEventArgsProvides data for the ReceiveChatMessage event
TwinEditor.Sharing.SessionContextContains behavior and state of a local or collaborative session
TwinEditor.Sharing.SessionStateDescribes the behavior of a SessionContext in a specific state
TwinEditor.Sharing.StartedExecutionEventArgsProvides data for the SessionContext.StartedExecution event
TwinEditor.Sharing.SynchronizationStateThis makes up the major part of a session: it provides synchronization among multiple sites, using a ISynchronizationStrategy to achieve this goal
TwinEditor.UI.AboutDialogThe AboutDialog displays information about the application to the user
TwinEditor.UI.ApplicationViewFormDisplalys the information in a ApplicationContext using a WinForms user interface
TwinEditor.UI.ClosableTabControlA UI control that provides the same functionality as TabControl, but also provides a way for the user to close certain tabs
TwinEditor.UI.CloseFileEventArgsProvides data for the IApplicationView.CloseFile event
TwinEditor.UI.ErrorMessageForm that shows an error message with optional additional information like the exception that caused the error
TwinEditor.UI.ExecutionViewFormA view that displays the data provided by an ExecutionResult
TwinEditor.UI.IApplicationViewProvides a view for the top-level application information, provided by the ApplicationContext
TwinEditor.UI.NewFileEventArgsProvides data for the IApplicationView.NewFile event
TwinEditor.UI.OpenFileEventArgsProvides data for the IApplicationView.OpenFile event
TwinEditor.UI.ParticipateEventArgsProvides data for the IApplicationView.Participate event
TwinEditor.UI.RecentFilesChangedEventArgs
TwinEditor.UI.RecentFilesListRecentFilesList is a bounded list that realized a most recently used list (MRUList)
TwinEditor.UI.SaveFileEventArgsProvides data for the IApplicationView.SaveFile event
TwinEditor.UI.SessionViewFormProvides a user view to a SessionContext using WinForms as the presentation layer
TwinEditor.UI.Settings.SettingsDialogDisplays the application settings and allows the user to make changes to them
TwinEditor.UI.ShareSessionEventArgsProvides data for the IApplicationView.ShareSession event
TwinEditor.UI.StateChangedEventArgsProvides data for the SessionViewForm.StateChanged event
TwinEditor.UI.TabClosedEventArgsProvides data for the ClosableTabControl.TabClosed event
